node.html: Helping companies to secure their products and infrastructures. Our customers range from various sectors: telecommunications, finance, automotive, retail, telco, industrial, transportation, medical, utilities.
Helping the company to improve and maintain its platform using Scala, Lift, JavaScript and MongoDB.
Helping the company to improve their microservices architecture using Scala, Akka and Lagom.
Helping the company to build the backend and the frontend for their web application and mobile application using Node.js and React. I also advise and train junior developers.
